channel.title: bandecca on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in bandecca on Barefoot Rob

item.title: schedule
item.description: Sunday, Dec 29, 1991 5:40PM (transcribed from Book Two of my diary) I was beaten soundly by Mr Bandecca 4 or 5 games in a row. I kinda felt bad, since he had commented about how he wanted a workout, not to just piss around.. He was very nice about it, and I believe sincere when he said he enjoyed playing. That’s cool. Last night I got a call from Cheri, who said she was going out with some guy who’s 31, apparently a real charmer, he’s made comments about her nice blonde hair & “good proportions” and commented that he’d like to take pictures of her.
